attributes.action: Ensure that MP's are prosecuted over mistakes, theft, missapropriation, fraud and ommissions in respect of payments from public funds in the same way as the General Public when claiming Council Tax , Tax Credits, Income Tax and any other State Benefits or funds and that they are made subject to the same punative punishments as those dealt out on a daily basis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
